Running tests on the current display is not permitted.
Test suites can take over the keyboard, mouse, and display for long periods. It is recommended that tests be executed in software-defined nested display.
See: https://www.x.org/archive/X11R7.5/doc/man/man1/Xnest.1.html See: https://freedesktop.org/wiki/Software/Xephyr/ See: https://github.com/io7m-com/xoanon/issues/19
On X11 platforms, specifying an alternative existing display using the DISPLAY environment variable can work:
DISPLAY=:1
If you really want to run tests on this display, define the following environment variable:
XOANON_REALLY_USE_LOCAL_DISPLAY=true
